困苦欠乏: (こんくけつぼう) - (yoji) hardships and privations
困苦窮乏: (こんくきゅうぼう) - (yoji) hardships and privations
困難: (konnan) - dificuldade, obstáculo, problema, aflição; inviabilidade, incapacidade (de realizar)
困難と戦う: (こんなんとたたかう) - to contend with difficulties
困難と闘う: (こんなんとたたかう) - to contend with difficulties
困難に陥れる: (こんなんにおとしいれる) - to put (a person) in a fix
囲いに入れる: (かこいにいれる) - to place in an enclosure
囲い込む: (かこいこむ) - to enclose; to impound; to cut off; to corral
囲う: (かこう) - to enclose/to surround/to encircle/to fence/to wall in; to shelter (e.g. a criminal)/to shield/to hide/to protect; to keep (e.g. a mistress); to store (vegetables, fruit, etc.)/to preserve; to protect
囲みを破る: (かこみをやぶる) - to break through a siege
囲み取材: (かこみしゅざい) - on-the-spot interview by surrounding reporters
囲む: (かごむ) - to surround/to encircle/to enclose/to fence/to wall in; to besiege/to lay siege to; to play (go, shogi, etc.)
囲碁三級: (いごさんきゅう) - third rank in the game of go
囲郭村: (いかくそん) - walled settlement; walled town
図: (zu/to/haka) - diagram , drawing, picture, diagram, figure, illustration, chart, graph; sight, scene
図がない: (ずがない) - unthinkable; extraordinary; preposterous; cannot be
図が無い: (ずがない) - unthinkable; extraordinary; preposterous; cannot be
図に乗る: (ずにのる) - to get carried away; to push one's luck; to push a good thing too far
図に当たる: (ずにあたる) - to hit the bull's-eye; to go as expected
図る: (はかる) - to plot/to attempt/to plan/to devise/to design; to take in/to deceive; to aim for/to have something in mind; to refer A to B
図を描く: (ずをかく) - to draw a diagram
図像: (ずぞう) - icon; simple ink drawing (of a buddha, mandala, etc.)
図南: (となん) - large undertaking attempted in a far-off land
図太い: (ずぶとい) - bold; shameless; cheeky; brash; impudent
図工室: (ずこうしつ) - drawing and manual arts room; arts and craft room
図形エディター: (ずけいエディター) - image editor
図形文字列: (ずけいもじれつ) - graphic character string
図形表示装置: (ずけいひょうじそうち) - graphic display (device)
図形記述子: (ずけいきじゅつし) - picture descriptor; PD
図抜ける: (ずぬける) - to tower above; to stand out
図星に当たる: (ずぼしにあたる) - to hit the bull's-eye
図星を指す: (ずぼしをさす) - to hit the nail on the head; to guess exactly right
図書カード: (としょカード) - (replaced the 図書券 ca 1990)  pre-paid card for purchasing books; Tosho card
図書券: (としょけん) - gift certificate for books; book token
図書目録: (としょもくろく) - book catalogue; book catalog; card catalogue; card catalog
図書館システム: (としょかんシステム) - library system
図書館ネットワーク: (としょかんネットワーク) - library network
図書館長: (としょかんちょう) - chief librarian
図画工作: (ずがこうさく) - drawing and manual arts
図示: (ずし) - illustration; showing in graphic form or by diagram
図表: (ずひょう) - chart; diagram; graph; figure
図表一覧: (ずひょういちらん) - list of illustrations
図解: (ずかい) - schematic; schema; illustration; explanatory diagram
図譜: (ずふ) - illustrated reference book; illustrated catalog
図鑑: (zukan) - livro ilustrado, livro de figuras, livro de referência ilustrado, manual de identificação, guia de campo
図面を引く: (ずめんをひく) - to draw a plan
固い: (かたい) - (esp. 固い & 堅い for wood, 硬い for metal and stone) hard/solid/tough; stiff/tight/wooden/unpolished (e.g. writing); strong/firm (not viscous or easily moved); safe/steady/honest/steadfast; obstinate/stubborn; (ant: 砕けた) bookish/formal/stuffy
固いことは言いっこなし: (かたいことはいいっこなし) - let's put formalities aside; let's not speak so stiffly
